relation: Goldshire: Fly to Flame Crest, Burning Steppes. Ride south through Redridge Mountains, heading west into Elwynn Forest. Stay clear of the human settlements and cavalry that patrols the road. The Elder is not in the town proper, so it's relatively easy to get.

Thundermar Ruins: Enter via Wetlands, the path by Grim Batol will be empty due to phasing. Wetlands can be reached from riding south from Hammerfall, Arathi Highlands. Can get past Victor's Point without aggroing any mobs and heading north to Thundermar is also strangely empty of mobs as well with phasing. If you are getting the other Twilight Highlands Elder, you should be able to rez slightly north of the village and make a clean break for it too. Stick to the river and grasslands, not the cultist areas. Pick up the Elder when a Dragonmaw attack isn't in progress.

Kharanos: Ride from Searing Gorge through Loch Modan into Dun Morogh (take the South gate). The town won't aggro guards, but the gnome Mechanostrider vendors are nearby and they will summon ?? guards if you get too close.
Blackchar Cave: watch from aggro from level 50 mobs.
Weeping Cave: Watch from aggro form level 50 mobs. Also inside a cave, so you will have to dismount.
Dreadmaul Rock: Watch from aggro from level 50 mobs. Get up to the top-most plateau, then jump down a tier to the south.
At Stormwind City's Gates: This is very easy to get for a city Elder-it just takes a lot of travel. See Goldshire Elder.
pageTitle: World of Warcraft: Warlords of Draenor News

Looks just like Swift Lovebird!
